price: Isa beela irraa isaan nyachiseefi sodaa irraa isaan tasgabbeesse.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
